ponss¶

This module contains the class PONSS, which is a variant of POSS to solve noisy subset selection problems.

class ponss.PONSS[source]¶

This class implements PONSS algorithm, which is a variant of POSS to solve noisy subset selection problems.

__init__()[source]¶
opt(objective, parameter)[source]¶

Pareto optimization under noise.

Parameters:
  • objective – an Objective object
  • parameter – a Parameters object
Returns:

the best solution of the optimization
static theta_dominate(theta, solution1, solution2)[source]¶

Judge if solution1 theta dominates solution2. :param theta: threshold :param solution1: a Solution object :param solution2: a Solution object :return: True or False

static theta_weak_dominate(theta, solution1, solution2)[source]¶

Judge if solution1 theta weakly dominates solution2. :param theta: threshold :param solution1: a Solution object :param solution2: a Solution object :return: True or False
